Name: Folio
Abstract: 20 photos of leaves for each of 32 different species.
RelevantInfo:
- The leaves were placed on a white background and then photographed. 
- The pictures were taken in broad daylight to ensure optimum light intensity.
Source:
The leaves were taken from plants in the farm of the University of Mauritius and nearby locations.

Acknowledgements: Munisami, T., Ramsurn, M., Kishnah, S. and Pudaruth, S., 2015. Plant leaf recognition using shape features and colour histogram with k-nearest neighbour classifiers. Procedia Computer Science (Elsevier) Journal. 58, pp. 740-747.
RelevantPapers: Munisami, T., Ramsurn, M., Kishnah, S. and Pudaruth, S., 2015. Plant leaf recognition using shape features and colour histogram with k-nearest neighbour classifiers. Procedia Computer Science (Elsevier) Journal. 58, pp. 740-747.
